content: vecna is a sock pattern that was designed as a mystery kal mock for the sock knitters anonymous 1 group at ravelry the pattern will appear in 4 clues these clues will be published on july 1st july 8th july 15th and july 22nd you ll need 80-100 grams of fingering weight yarn 4 stitch markers a cable needle if you use one for cabling a tapestry needle and knitting needles to achieve a gauge of 9 stitches and 12 rounds per inch 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/sock-knitters-anonymous
